sen.e: FUJIWARA no Nakanari (774-October 16, 810) was the Kugyo (court noble) of the early Heian period.

sen.e: Once the Emperor Saga took after Emperor Heijo in 809, Nakanari and Kusuko siblings, who feared the loss of political power, moved to the Heijokyo with the retired emperor and schemed the choso (a second accession to the imperial throne) of the retired emperor and caused the conflict between imperial courts located at two places.
